function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation and air flow may result in poor indoor air quality and contribute to the spread of airborne diseases.","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne disease transmission and compromised respiratory health of building occupants.","Mitigation":"Regular inspection and maintenance of ventilation systems, proper air flow management, and use of high-efficiency filters.","Technologies":"High-efficiency particulate air (HEPA) filters, air purifiers, air quality sensors.","People":"Building occupants, particularly those with respiratory illnesses or compromised immune systems.","Owner":"Facility management, HVAC technicians, building owners."},{"Description":"Presence of odors in the building may indicate the presence of unsanitary conditions or mold growth, which can contribute to the spread of diseases.","Impact":"Increased risk of mold-related illnesses, respiratory infections, and microbial contamination of indoor spaces.","Mitigation":"Prompt investigation and remediation of odor sources, regular cleaning and inspection of building interiors, and proper management of waste and moisture.","Technologies":"Moisture meters, thermal imaging cameras, air quality testing kits.","People":"Facility management, building occupants, cleaning staff.","Owner":"Building owners, property management, facility maintenance teams."},{"Description":"Unclean or inadequate maintenance of ventilation systems can lead to reduced system efficiency and accumulation of contaminants, contributing to indoor air pollution.","Impact":"Decreased air quality, potential spread of dust, allergens, and microbial contaminants, and compromised respiratory health of occupants.","Mitigation":"Regular cleaning and maintenance of ventilation systems, use of high-efficiency filters, and proper disposal of collected contaminants.","Technologies":"Mechanical cleaning equipment, robotic duct cleaners, ultraviolet germicidal irradiation (UVGI) systems.","People":"HVAC technicians, facilities maintenance staff, building occupants.","Owner":"Facility management, building owners, HVAC service providers."}]}
